intro: Monteverdia lineata, commonly known as the silverleaf monteverdia, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and climbers. The plant is characterized by its delicate, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale yellow.
